title: Index of Factory Payrolls, Knit Goods for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1919-1924, (2)--Original Data, 1923-1939. Data For 1919 Is Based On An Unweighted Index. Data For 1923-1939 Is Based On A Weighted Index. Source: Bureau Of Labor Statistics, Bulletin 610 For 1919-1924, And Mimeographed Report, September, 1938 For 1923.

This NBER data series m08124a appears on the NBER website in Chapter 8 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter08.html.

NBER Indicator: m08124a
